page.description: Moves the focus to the object to the right, as if the user pressed the "Right" cursor key.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.RIGHT() method moves the focus to the right as if the user had pressed the "Right" key.

section.title: Example
section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = form.view("Customer Information") ptr.right()
